title: Request a "Recherche d'Emploi ou Création d'Entreprise" (or "APS Jeune diplômé") residence permit, or a "récépissé" renewal
description:
This service is provided by the International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO) of Université Grenoble Alpes to all students, PhD students, researchers and their families studying or working at UGA or in one of our partner institutions in Grenoble and Valence.

Important

  1. This form is intended only to: # Apply for a "Recherche d'Emploi ou Création d'Entreprise" (or "APS Jeune Diplômé") residence permit # Apply for a renewal of your "récépissé"
  2. This service, offered by the Université Grenoble Alpes’ International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO), only aim to facilitate the management of applications. Only Préfecture officers will review and process your application.
  3. Please refer to the complete list of required documents, available on the UGA international website before submitting your application: https://international.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr/getting-organized/visas-and-residence-permits/

For information, it usually takes a week for ISSO to process your application.
The information you provide in filling out this questionnaire will be saved electronically only for the time needed to review your documents, and will be treated as strictly confidential. Only staff members from UGA department of International Affairs (DGD DIT) will be able to access your documents. No information will be communicated to anyone outside of the university. If you wish to exercise your rights within the framework of the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation, you can make a request by contacting: isso@univ-grenoble-alpes.fr.
zones: Ministère de l'Enseignement supérieur et de la Recherche

champDescriptors.label: Reminder
champDescriptors.description:
This service is offered by the Université Grenoble Alpes’ International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO).

> This form is not made to submit directly your application to the Isère or Drôme Prefectures, it only facilitates the management of applications and allows for the verification of “Job Seeking or Business Creation” card applications.

> The verification does not guarantee the acceptance of your application by the Préfecture.

> Only applications relating to the status of students and researchers will be verified, any other applications (employees, asylum, etc.) will not be processed.

champDescriptors.label: Reason for appointment
options: Apply for a "Recherche d'Emploi ou Création d'Entreprise" (RECE), or "APS Jeune Diplômé" residence permit
Obtain a duplicate following a theft or loss
Change the address or correct an information on your residence permit
Apply for a renewal of your "récépissé" issued by the Isère or Drôme Préfecture

champDescriptors.label: Your status
options: Spouse of a PhD student / researcher

champDescriptors.label: Your academic division / institution
options: Alpine Geography and Urban Planning Institute (UGA)
Faculty of Humanities, Health, Sports and Societies (UGA)
Grenoble INP, Graduate schools of Engineering and Management (UGA)

champDescriptors.label: Residence permit or long-stay visa or "récépissé"
champDescriptors.description: Scan of your residence permit (both sides), or passport page containing the visa, or "récépissé" issued by the Isère or Drôme Préfecture

champDescriptors.label: Expiration (end) date of your current visa, your residence permit, or your "récépissé"
Application for a "Recherche d'Emploi ou Création d'Entreprise" (RECE), or an "APS Jeune Diplômé" residence permit
ISSO application verification
champDescriptors.description: If your request relates to the "Recherche d'Emploi ou Création d'Entreprise" (Job Seeking or Business Creation) card (or "APS Jeune Diplômé"), ISSO has to verify your application file before offering an appointment. Please submit all needed supporting documents below.

champDescriptors.label: Reminder
champDescriptors.description: Documents written in a language other than French must be translated by a sworn translator accredited by French courts.

champDescriptors.label: Passport
champDescriptors.description: Identity page (if it is your first residence permit card application, add all the pages containing entry stamps in the Schengen Area and other visas)

champDescriptors.label: ID photos
champDescriptors.description:
ISSO does not verify ID photos before your appointment with the Prefecture.
Photos must be recent, taken in France, in a 35 mm x 45 mm – ISO/IEC 19794 – 5: 2005 standard format.

champDescriptors.label: Proof of address
champDescriptors.description: Dated less than 6 months and in your name, or, if you are hosted, in the name of the person hosting you. Documents accepted: * Electricity, gas, water, phone or internet bill * House insurance certificate ("Attestation d’assurance habitation") * Certificate from a student residence ("Attestation de residence") * Rental contract ("Bail") * Rent receipt or bill * Attestation from a hotel (only dated less than a month) along with the last bill.

champDescriptors.label: If you are hosted by someone
champDescriptors.description:
« Attestation d’hébergement » form, filled in and signed by the person hosting you.
A template is provided on UGA International website.

champDescriptors.label: If you are hosted by someone [2]
champDescriptors.description: Host’s valid French/European ID, or residence permit (if it’s a VLS-TS, add the confirmation of the validation ; if it’s a card, the address must be up to date)

champDescriptors.label: « Attestation de droits à l’assurance maladie »
champDescriptors.description: Proof of health insurance (Social security), temporary or permanent.

champDescriptors.label: If you have a student ("Étudiant") residence permit
champDescriptors.description:
Certificate of achievement or diploma.
If you do not have one of these documents yet, a statement from the school or university stating the estimated date when you will receive your certificate of achievement or diploma.

champDescriptors.label: If you have a "Passeport Talent - Chercheur" residence permit
If you have a "Passeport Talent - Chercheur" residence permit [2]
champDescriptors.description: Statement from your research organization certifying the completion of your research work

champDescriptors.label: Additional comment about your application (optional)
champDescriptors.description: If you wish to provide further details about your situation for the ISSO team

champDescriptors.label: For all: additional details about appointments
Important information
champDescriptors.description: Once your application is submitted on this form, ISSO will verify appointment availability with the prefecture in order to offer you the earliest available appointment. You will then receive an email with a proposed date, and if you choose to accept that appointment, a second notification email with the date and time of your appointment. In September and October, there is a large amount of applications and there can be a waiting period of up to one month. If the first appointment date offered by ISSO is not convenient for you, please note that having another appointment can take several weeks. Please remember that the administration giving the appointments is the prefecture, ISSO is only attempting to make this process easier for you! In the case of an unjustified absence from an assigned appointment, your application will be considered non-priority and the waiting period for receiving another appointment may be prolonged.

champDescriptors.label: Possible unavailability for an appointment
champDescriptors.description: You can indicate any dates or times that do not work with your schedule. ISSO will attempt to take this into account whenever possible (without any guarantee) when giving you an appointment.
